SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM folderholder INNER JOIN mediaobject ON folderholder.ivid = mediaobject.ivid WHERE categoryid = #id#
ORDER BY photographdate
ORDER BY versiontitlelng$usedLanguage$
ORDER BY people
ORDER BY sitelng$usedLanguage$
ORDER BY byline
ORDER BY createdate
ASC
DESC

SELECT
, 1 as usedLanguage FROM mediaobject WHERE licvalid <= #value#

SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM mediaobject WHERE createdate > #start# AND createdate < #end# ORDER BY createdate DESC

SELECT
, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage
FROM mediaobject
FROM mediaobject WHERE mediaobject.ivid IN (SELECT DISTINCT aclimage.ivid FROM aclimage WHERE
((aclimage.principalid = #groupPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 1) OR (aclimage.principalid = #userPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 2))
)
ORDER BY photographdate DESC
ORDER BY createdate DESC
LIMIT 0,#count#
